translations: v.给……盖以拱顶；跳跃，跃升（vault 的现在分词）

sentences.sentence: Vaulting the stile, he headed diagonally across the paddock.
sentences.translation: 他跃过梯台，从围场里斜穿过去。

sentences.sentence: At the 1896 Olympics in Athens, a bamboo pole was used to set the vaulting record of 10 feet 6 inches.
sentences.translation: 在1896年雅典奥运会上，一根竹竿被用来创造10英尺6英寸的跳高纪录。

sentences.sentence: Yet this vaulting ambition brought disaster.
sentences.translation: 然而这种膨胀的野心带来了灾难。
